attributes.contentHtml:
since epikhost drama is over, lets talk about this...

Welcome to my podcast! namely exposing rainbowstudio

(if you think this is not related to hosting then just read the conclusion)

they're not just stealing clients and lying

apparently everyone in the rainbowstudios dev team is a fuckin skid

here, their github organization: https://github.com/TeamRainbowDevs

every single repo has >10 commits which are mainly readme and updating package files. we can derive that its just download and upload repos, if you want just take a statement with uniquely defined variables from each of the repository and run it through github, you'll get a result back of the exact parent / forked repos WITH the unique var name, letter to letter.

alright now lets talk about tejas, which I had many experiences with, my beloved copy paster who copies every single fuckin project I make.

1 copied my discord bot without giving creds, even banned me for claiming the code.

he copied my discord bot without giving credits, banned me and the other developers from rainbowdev server because we were claiming the code. He even went as far as to selling "premium" version of his bot. I had to close source it for him to run without my updates ðŸ¤®

look at the folder named "opbot" (his bot) and admitting of running my code

^^ above image also proves that he doesnt know shit about coding

2 copied my afk page

he copied my afk page without giving creds ofc, claimed that "he made the afk page"

what a terrible way to make money, @TejasLamba if you wanna run a fuckin afk page then make sure to change the arc setup next time

I was making money from his afk page cuz his skiddin ass couldnt understand how to change the fuckin arc config

proof the site was mine:

him admitting that the page was mine and that he doesnt care

lol making money from his afk page xD

I was gonna fill the dmca form but I didnt bothered cuz I made like 15$ off of his page ðŸ™‚

3 copied my npm package

my npm package has been used quite alot by the discord bot developers over the past few months, ofc he will skid every successful project of mine right?

Conclusion

I think we all know that they are not capable of running their own host. After the "colorful" past with original developers they copied from (including me). I bet they dont even know the basic linux cmds, let alone running a fuckin host with free un-modified themes and freenom domains with absolutely no coding experience.

they are just 12yr old salty indian kids without any money, running their only server on digitalocean free creds.

ofc they dont care about how much hardwork the developers put into writing their own projects, they just copy the whole fuckin shit and claim ownership of it. They know nothing about coding / programming and are doing all this just to gain popularity imo

this is just funny

skid accusing a skid of skidding lmfao

And if you are a dev for rainbowstudios then dont even dare fuckin claiming that all of this isnt true, all proof is attached above.

Thank you all for coming to my podcast, have a nice day.

attributes.title: Asjad & Rainbow Studio Hosting - Scummy, Lying and Stealing Clients
